item.title: About
item.description: About codessl.com I blog about software development, functional programming and machine learning. If it is not obvious already, ssl is my initial and is neither Secure Socket Layer nor Self-Supervised Learning. About Sheng-Loong Su I am currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at a very early stage stealth fintech startup. As part of the founding team, I enjoy building products and services using pure functional programming with Scala and the Typelevel stack (Cats, Cats Effect, fs2, http4s, etc.
